languages.text: {n}Абеляр морщится, как от зубной боли.{/n} "Вы только посмотрите, кто всплыл. Почту за честь избавить нас от этого "преследователя", если он когда-нибудь окажется на расстоянии выстрела".
{n}Abelard winces as if from toothache.{/n} "Look who's decided to resurface. It will be my honour to rid us of this 'pursuer' if he ever comes within shot."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр морщится, как от зубной боли.{/n} "Вы только посмотрите, кто всплыл. Почту за честь избавить нас от этого "преследователя", если он когда-нибудь окажется на расстоянии выстрела".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard winces as if from a toothache.{/n} "Look who's decided to show his face. It will be my honor to rid us of this 'pursuer' if he ever comes within shot."
{n}Abelard winces as if from a toothache.{/n} "Look who's decided to show his face. It will be my honor to rid us of this 'pursuer' if he ever comes within shot."
{n}Abelard winces as if from toothache.{/n} "Look who's decided to resurface. It will be my honor to rid us of this 'pursuer' if he ever comes within shot."
{n}Abelard winces as if from toothache.{/n} "Look who's decided to resurface. It will be my honor to rid us of this 'pursuer' if he ever comes within shot."
{n}Abelard winces as if from toothache.{/n} "Look who's decided to resurface. It will be my honour to rid us of this 'pursuer' if he ever comes within shot."

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは歯が痛むかのように顔をしかめた。{/n}「まさかあんな奴と再び出会うとは。今度射程圏内に入ったら、喜んでこの『追手』を排除してやります」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as if from toothache.{/n} "Look who's decided to resurface. It will be my honour to rid us of this 'pursuer' if he ever comes within shot."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラードは歯が痛むかのように顔をしかめた。{/n}「まさかあんな奴と再び出会うとは。今度射程圏内に入ったら、喜んでこの"追手"を排除してやります」

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸抽搐着，仿佛牙疼一般。{/n}“看看啊，是谁终于打算露面了。若是他出现在射程范围之内，我很乐意替我们消灭掉这位‘追击者’。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as if from toothache.{/n} "Look who's decided to resurface. It will be my honour to rid us of this 'pursuer' if he ever comes within shot."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸抽搐着，仿佛牙疼一般。{/n}“看看啊，是谁终于打算露面了。若是他出现在射程范围之内，我很乐意替我们消灭掉这位‘追击者’。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard se estremece como si le doliera una muela.{/n} «Vuelve a dejarse ver. Si alguna vez lo tengo a tiro, será un honor librarnos de esta "persecución"».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as if from toothache.{/n} "Look who's decided to resurface. It will be my honour to rid us of this 'pursuer' if he ever comes within shot."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard se estremece como si le doliera una muela.{/n} «Vuelve a dejarse ver. Si alguna vez lo tengo a tiro, será un honor librarnos de esta "persecución"».

languages.text: {n}Abélard grimace comme si ses dents le faisaient souffrir.{/n} « Regardez un peu qui a décidé de montrer le bout de son nez. Ce sera pour moi un honneur de nous débarrasser de ce "poursuivant" s'il a le malheur de passer à ma portée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as if from toothache.{/n} "Look who's decided to resurface. It will be my honour to rid us of this 'pursuer' if he ever comes within shot."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard grimace comme si ses dents le faisaient souffrir.{/n} « Regardez un peu qui a décidé de montrer le bout de son nez. Ce sera pour moi un honneur de nous débarrasser de ce "poursuivant" s'il a le malheur de passer à ma portée. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard zuckt zusammen, als hätte er Zahnschmerzen.{/n} "Na, wer taucht denn da wieder auf? Es wird mir eine Ehre sein, uns von diesem 'Verfolger' zu befreien, falls er jemals in Schussweite kommt."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as if from toothache.{/n} "Look who's decided to resurface. It will be my honour to rid us of this 'pursuer' if he ever comes within shot."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard zuckt zusammen, als hätte er Zahnschmerzen.{/n} "Na, wer taucht denn da wieder auf? Es wird mir eine Ehre sein, uns von diesem 'Verfolger' zu befreien, falls er jemals in Schussweite kommt."

languages.text: {n}Abelard diş ağrısı çekercesine irkiliyor.{/n} "Bakın hele kim tekrar ortaya çıkmaya karar vermiş. Yakınıma gelirse bu 'takipçimizin' icabına bakmaktan onur duyarım."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as if from toothache.{/n} "Look who's decided to resurface. It will be my honour to rid us of this 'pursuer' if he ever comes within shot."
